data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Mikhail Vilkov awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 2, Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
David Karaev for the away team is judged to be offside.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 5, Can Sochi capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Sochi.
In the minute 9, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Sochi in Sochi.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
In the minute 10, Mikhail Vilkov signals a Sochi throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
Sochi's Sergey Terekhov misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
In the minute 11, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in the half of Sochi.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Vyacheslav Podberezkin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Sochi have a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Mikhail Vilkov signals a throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg, close to Sochi's area.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 19, Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sochi.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 23, Sochi will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Ural Yekaterinburg.
David Karaev of Ural Yekaterinburg is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 25, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Miha Mevlja (Sochi) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
In the minute 27, Throw-in for Sochi close to the penalty box.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 29, Vladimir Fedotov is making the team's first substitution at Fisht Olympic Stadium with Ivan Miladinovic replacing Emanuel Mammana.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Sochi.
In the minute 31, Corner awarded to Sochi.
In Sochi, Nikita Burmistrov of Sochi is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Ivan Miladinovic of Sochi gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 32, Mikhail Vilkov awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Sochi to take a throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg territory.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
In the minute 33, Sochi drive forward but Christian Noboa is judged offside.
Sochi needs to be cautious. Ural Yekaterinburg have an attacking throw-in.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
In the minute 36, Ball goes out of play for a Ural Yekaterinburg goal kick.
Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Eric Bicfalvi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sochi defender.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Anton Zabolotnyi for Sochi is back on the field again.
In the minute 39, Attention is being given to Sochiâ€™s Anton Zabolotnyi and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Sochi's Anton Zabolotnyi gets in a shot on goal at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
In the minute 41, Corner awarded to Sochi.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Sochi in their own half.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 44, Can Sochi get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half?
Sochi push forward at Fisht Olympic Stadium and Christian Noboa gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Ural Yekaterinburg defence.
Throw-in Sochi.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Ural Yekaterinburg have a dangerous throw-in.
Sochi are coming forward and Christian Noboa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 45, Ural Yekaterinburg have a goal kick.
The first-half has come to a close in Sochi.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 49, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
At Fisht Olympic Stadium, Sergey Terekhov has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 51, Ural Yekaterinburg surge into the attack at Fisht Olympic Stadium but Vladimir Rykovâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Sochi.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 52, Nikita Burmistrov (Sochi) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Eric Bicfalvi (Ural Yekaterinburg) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 55, Mikhail Vilkov awards the away team a throw-in.
Throw-in Sochi.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 57, Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a throw-in for Sochi, close to Ural Yekaterinburg's area.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Sochi needs to be cautious. Ural Yekaterinburg have an attacking throw-in.
Throw-in high up the field for Ural Yekaterinburg in Sochi.
In the minute 60, Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Vladimir Rykov for Ural Yekaterinburg gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Mikhail Vilkov awards Sochi a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Mikhail Vilkov signals a Sochi throw-in in Ural Yekaterinburg's half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Sochi.
Sochi awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sochi.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
In the minute 65, Ural Yekaterinburg's Roman Emeljanov breaks free at Fisht Olympic Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Sochi have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Sochi at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 66, Ball safe as Ural Yekaterinburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Ural Yekaterinburg close to the penalty box.
Ural Yekaterinburg have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
In the minute 68, Eric Bicfalvi (Ural Yekaterinburg) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Sochi push upfield but Mikhail Vilkov quickly pulls them for offside.
Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
In the minute 71, Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Sochi.
Sochi are pushing forward but Joaozinho's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 72, Ural Yekaterinburg to take a throw-in in Sochi territory.
Aleksandr Rudenko is on a sub for Nikita Burmistrov for Sochi.
The home team have replaced Joaozinho with Elmir Nabiullin. This is the third substitution made today by Vladimir Fedotov.
In the minute 74, Yuriy Matveev (Ural Yekaterinburg) is making a first substitution, with Aleksey Evseev replacing David Karaev.
Sochi awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Sochi drive upfield and Elmir Nabiullin gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Ural Yekaterinburg defender.
In the minute 77, Throw-in for Sochi in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Sochi just outside Ural Yekaterinburg's area.
Sochi are coming forward and Christian Noboa gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 78, Mikhail Vilkov awards Ural Yekaterinburg a goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg make their second substitution with Rafal Augustyniak replacing Roman Emeljanov.
In the minute 79, Free kick for Sochi in their own half.
In Sochi a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Aleksey Evseev (Ural Yekaterinburg) has received a yellow card from Mikhail Vilkov.
Goal kick for Ural Yekaterinburg at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
In the minute 80, Free kick Ural Yekaterinburg.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Sochi's half?
In the minute 82, The away team replace Vyacheslav Podberezkin with Artem Shabolin.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In the minute 83, Sochi have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Andrey Egorychev for Ural Yekaterinburg has been booked by Mikhail Vilkov and receives a first yellow card.
Mikhail Vilkov signals a free kick to Ural Yekaterinburg in their own half.
Mikhail Vilkov waits before resuming play because Artem Shabolin for Ural Yekaterinburg is still down.
In the minute 85, Ural Yekaterinburgâ€™s Artem Shabolin is on his feet again at Fisht Olympic Stadium.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
Mikhail Vilkov signals a Ural Yekaterinburg throw-in in Sochi's half.
In the minute 87, Sochi have a goal kick.
Ural Yekaterinburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Ural Yekaterinburg close to the penalty box.
In the minute 89, Nikolay Zolotov is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Corner awarded to Ural Yekaterinburg.
Ural Yekaterinburg's Nikolay Zolotov looks ok and returns to the pitch.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 3 minutes of added time.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Sochi have been awarded a corner by Mikhail Vilkov.
Free kick for Sochi in the half of Ural Yekaterinburg.
In Sochi Ural Yekaterinburg attack through Denys Kulakov. The finish is off target, however.
Mikhail Vilkov awards Sochi a goal kick.
Can Ural Yekaterinburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Sochi's half?
The second-half is over. The match ends 0-0.
